sqlMap.delete: UPDATE jnitboardinfo SET ACTIVE = '0' WHERE BOARD_ID=#boardId#
UPDATE jnitboardinfo SET ISDEL = 1 ,ACTIVE = 0 WHERE BOARD_ID=#boardId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT BOARD_ID , BOARD_GROUP , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_SKIN , ROW_CNT , USE_REPLY , BOARD_SORT , BOARD_LBL , FIELD_SORT_LIST , FIELD_SORT_VIEW , FIELD_SORT_WRITE , USE_INTERNAL , USE_CMT , USE_LIST_REPLY , USE_VIEW_REPLY , USE_ACTIVE , USE_SECRET , USE_NOTICE , USE_FILTER , FILTER_ACTION , USE_WYSWYG , USE_WYSWYG_TYPE , USE_FILE , USE_IMAGE , USE_MOVIE , USE_SMS , SMS_NUM , USE_CATEGORY , CATEGORY , USE_SOCIAL , USE_LANGUAGE , USE_EXT01 , EXT01_OPT , EXT01_LBL , USE_EXT02 , EXT02_OPT , EXT02_LBL , USE_EXT03 , EXT03_OPT , EXT03_LBL , USE_EXT04 , EXT04_OPT , EXT04_LBL , USE_EXT05 , EXT05_OPT , EXT05_LBL , USE_EXT06 , EXT06_OPT , EXT06_LBL , USE_EXT07 , EXT07_OPT , EXT07_LBL , USE_EXT08 , EXT08_OPT , EXT08_LBL , USE_EXT09 , EXT09_OPT , EXT09_LBL , USE_EXT10 , EXT10_OPT , EXT10_LBL , USE_EXT11 , EXT11_OPT , EXT11_LBL , USE_EXT12 , EXT12_OPT , EXT12_LBL , USE_EXT13 , EXT13_OPT , EXT13_LBL , USE_EXT14 , EXT14_OPT , EXT14_LBL , USE_EXT15 , EXT15_OPT , EXT15_LBL , USE_EXT16 , EXT16_OPT , EXT16_LBL , USE_EXT17 , EXT17_OPT , EXT17_LBL , USE_EXT18 , EXT18_OPT , EXT18_LBL , USE_EXT19 , EXT19_OPT , EXT19_LBL , USE_EXT20 , EXT20_OPT , EXT20_LBL , USE_DATE01 , DATE01_OPT , DATE01_LBL , USE_DATE02 , DATE02_OPT , DATE02_LBL , USE_REACT , ADM_EXT , ADM_LIST , PERM_LIST , PERM_VIEW , PERM_WRITE , PERM_REPLY , PERM_CMT , PERM_LIST_TYPE , PERM_VIEW_TYPE , PERM_WRITE_TYPE , PERM_REPLY_TYPE , PERM_CMT_TYPE , ANON_PERM_LIST , ANON_PERM_VIEW , ANON_PERM_WRITE , HIDE_WRITE , ACTIVE , PERM_FILE_DOWN , PERM_FILE_DOWN_TYPE , BOARD_URL , FILE_BLACKLIST , FILE_LIMIT_SIZE , FILE_LIMIT_COUNT , USE_LATESTLIST , THUMB_WIDTH , THUMB_HEIGHT , THUMB_MAXDIM , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5 , ISDEL FROM jnitboardinfo WHERE BOARD_ID=#boardId#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , BOARD_ID , BOARD_GROUP , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_SKIN , ROW_CNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM jnitboardinfo ) WHERE 1=1 AND ISDEL=0
BOARD_GROUP = #searchBoardGroup#
BOARD_ID = #searchKeyword#
BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
BOARD_ID = #selectList[]#
) WHERE 1=1
AND RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID , BOARD_GROUP , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_SKIN , ROW_CNT , USE_REPLY , BOARD_SORT , BOARD_LBL , FIELD_SORT_LIST , FIELD_SORT_VIEW , FIELD_SORT_WRITE , USE_INTERNAL , USE_CMT , USE_LIST_REPLY , USE_VIEW_REPLY , USE_ACTIVE , USE_SECRET , USE_NOTICE , USE_FILTER , FILTER_ACTION , USE_WYSWYG , USE_WYSWYG_TYPE , USE_FILE , USE_IMAGE , USE_MOVIE , USE_SMS , SMS_NUM , USE_CATEGORY , CATEGORY , USE_SOCIAL , USE_LANGUAGE , USE_EXT01 , EXT01_OPT , EXT01_LBL , USE_EXT02 , EXT02_OPT , EXT02_LBL , USE_EXT03 , EXT03_OPT , EXT03_LBL , USE_EXT04 , EXT04_OPT , EXT04_LBL , USE_EXT05 , EXT05_OPT , EXT05_LBL , USE_EXT06 , EXT06_OPT , EXT06_LBL , USE_EXT07 , EXT07_OPT , EXT07_LBL , USE_EXT08 , EXT08_OPT , EXT08_LBL , USE_EXT09 , EXT09_OPT , EXT09_LBL , USE_EXT10 , EXT10_OPT , EXT10_LBL , USE_EXT11 , EXT11_OPT , EXT11_LBL , USE_EXT12 , EXT12_OPT , EXT12_LBL , USE_EXT13 , EXT13_OPT , EXT13_LBL , USE_EXT14 , EXT14_OPT , EXT14_LBL , USE_EXT15 , EXT15_OPT , EXT15_LBL , USE_EXT16 , EXT16_OPT , EXT16_LBL , USE_EXT17 , EXT17_OPT , EXT17_LBL , USE_EXT18 , EXT18_OPT , EXT18_LBL , USE_EXT19 , EXT19_OPT , EXT19_LBL , USE_EXT20 , EXT20_OPT , EXT20_LBL , USE_DATE01 , DATE01_OPT , DATE01_LBL , USE_DATE02 , DATE02_OPT , DATE02_LBL , USE_REACT , ADM_EXT , ADM_LIST , PERM_LIST , PERM_VIEW , PERM_WRITE , PERM_REPLY , PERM_CMT , PERM_LIST_TYPE , PERM_VIEW_TYPE , PERM_WRITE_TYPE , PERM_REPLY_TYPE , PERM_CMT_TYPE , ANON_PERM_LIST , ANON_PERM_VIEW , ANON_PERM_WRITE , HIDE_WRITE , ACTIVE , PERM_FILE_DOWN , PERM_FILE_DOWN_TYPE , BOARD_URL , FILE_BLACKLIST , FILE_LIMIT_SIZE , FILE_LIMIT_COUNT , USE_LATESTLIST , THUMB_WIDTH , THUMB_HEIGHT , THUMB_MAXDIM , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5 , ISDEL FROM jnitboardinfo
WHERE 1=1 AND ISDEL=0
BOARD_GROUP = #searchBoardGroup#
BOARD_ID = #searchKeyword#
BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
(BOARD_ID = #searchKeyword# OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' )
(ADM_EXT LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword2#||'%' OR ADM_LIST LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' )
BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword3#,'%')
BOARD_GROUP = #searchKeyword4#
ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC
ORDER BY BOARD_GROUP, BOARD_TITLE ASC
ORDER BY BOARD_GROUP, BOARD_TITLE DESC
)A WHERE 1=1
ROWNUM <= #lastIndex#
)WHERE 1=1
RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM jnitboardinfo WHERE 1=1 AND ISDEL=0
BOARD_GROUP = #searchBoardGroup#
BOARD_ID = #searchKeyword#
BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
(BOARD_ID = #searchKeyword# OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' )
SELECT NEXT_ID FROM JNITSEQ WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'JNITBOARDINFO_ID'
SELECT DISTINCT( BOARD_GROUP ) as BOARD_GROUP FROM JNITBOARDINFO WHERE ACTIVE=1
sqlMap.statement:
CREATE TABLE $id$
AS SELECT * FROM jnitboardtpl
